title: Claim Deduction for Student Loan Interest
description: A taxpayer who paid student loan interest wants to claim the deduction.

tasks.description: Obtain Form 1098-E, Student Loan Interest Statement, from the taxpayer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the necessary tax form.

tasks.description: Enter the amount of interest paid from Form 1098-E.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs the interest amount.

tasks.description: Calculate the allowable deduction, taking into account any income phase-out limitations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the final deduction amount to be reported on Schedule 1.
